description:
After rumors fly about how Madoka used to be, she ends up getting Kyosuke drunk, and then... both aren`t sure how to handle what happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vita pivata di Madoka!? Un bacio con le bollicine
Madoka no Shiseikatsu!? Kuchizuke Spark Iro
Madoka`s Private Life?! A Spark-Colored Kiss
まどかの私生活!? 口づけスパーク色
